content: this is my simple all in one mini easter chick pattern it is designed to be worked in one piece without having to join on any other parts it takes about 15 minutes to complete one chick and uses approx 8 metres 8 3/4 yards of yarn each with a 3 5mm hook they measure about 5 cm 2 inches in height and 4 cm 1 1/2 inches in width with this particular pattern you can use either 6mm safety eyes or use the glue on sunglasses accessory that you can purchase from aliexpress / amazon / etsy etc great project to use up your scrap balls of yarn too please see my other all in one patterns
